attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we petition the government to scrap the idea for a 'guided busway' between on the trackbed of the old railwayline between Huntingdon & Cambridge due to the lack of support from the public, and instead to reopen the said railway, which is well supported in the Area

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Scrap the Huntingdon-Cambridge Guided busway."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14155.asp

Prime Minister's Office
